scene.name: intro
scene.line: Hello, out there! Headed up or down?
scene.option: I'm just looking for the crew of `The Mucky Mammoth`.

scene.name: unsure
scene.line: Hm. Best never to dive with doubt in your heart, though it can't always be helped.

scene.name: crew
scene.line: Yes, ma'am, they stop here every morning. I expect they're upstairs now, and Ida's got the coffee going. I could use a cup myself; it's cold down there!

scene.name: bye
scene.line: Well, head on upstairs, and she'll take care of you. I'll be along in a minute.
